publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4644 Mr Mark Ruskell: Scotland’s Festival of Stewardship—That the Parliament congratulates the Falkland Centre for Stewardship, organisers of Scotland’s first Festival of Stewardship, to be held at Falkland in Fife from 30 June to 2 July 2006; applauds the creativity and imagination which has been applied to developing an ambitious and attractive programme of festival events and activities over the weekend; notes that more information about the festival can be found at www.bigtent2006.co.uk; commends the Falkland Centre for Stewardship for its vision in bringing together communities, voluntary organisations and businesses in celebration of the important concept of stewardship, to encourage people to live and work sustainably; believes that the event offers great educational potential as a recipe for people to learn how to improve the quality of life and of the environment, while having fun at the same time; wishes this pioneering event the success that it deserves, and hopes that this year’s festival may be the first of many such events to be held in future years.
